entities.name: women
entities.description: The women are fighting each other, indicating a lack of cooperation and harmony among them.

entities.name: remnants
entities.description: The remnants of the old tribes are fighting each other, showing that even in their weakened state, they still have conflicts.

entities.name: Karkus
entities.description: Karkus is a giant leader who has been killed by Golgomath, as mentioned later in the conversation.

entities.name: Golgomath
entities.description: Golgomath is a new Gurg who has taken over and is not interested in listening to Hagrid and his group.

relationships.description: The women and remnants of the old tribes are fighting each other, indicating a lack of cooperation and harmony among them.
Karkus was killed by Golgomath, as mentioned later in the conversation.
